title: Look And Live
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c

v1: Look and live! look and live!
Look at what the Lord has done,
See Him lifted on the tree,
Look and live! look and live!
v2: Look and live! look and live!
Look away from self and sin,
Look and live! look and live!
Look to Me, you shall be saved,
v3: Look and live! look and live!
Look and live! look and live!
c1: Look! the Lord is lifted high,
Look to Him, He's ever nigh;
Look and live! why will you die?
